name: Gamma Burst
description: Deals 30 damage to target, has a 95% chance to Irradiate (3 damage/turn) for 3 turns, or a 2% chance to 'Hulkerize' target doubling their attack power for 3 turns instead.

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 30); int roll = Rng.Next(100); if (roll < 2) { ApplyHulkerize(Opponent); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is HULKERIZED!"); } else if (roll < 97) { ApplyIrradiate(Opponent); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is irradiated!"); }
